title: Loading indicator spins until all service calls complete
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has opened a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user waits for the contract to load
custom_expected: THEN spinner remains until all components load

title: As Club/BOC, I want to see the english and spanish versions of language in the language viewer
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on a newly created contract
custom_steps:
WHEN opens up language viewer for a clause with language toggle options
AND User sets language toggle to spanish on the right of the Label Dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN Language toggle appears to the right of label dropdown
AND only has english and spanish, defaulting to english
AND toggles lets you swtich between english and spanish of the selected label
AND effective dates dropdown should refresh with effective dates available for that language version

title: Update override Add C rule: 19.3
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has created a first year domestic contract for a player whose birth AND home country are US
AND the Addendum C has been completed with values of anything but $1100 in AAA, AA, A, SA, RA, and R
custom_expected: THEN show overrideable warning for BOTH Club and BOC: "The salary for level(s) of play [level(s) of play] must be $[required amount] for the first season"

title: Update override Add C rule: 19.6
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has created a first year international contract
AND has entered anything but the following values in the Addendum C: 
    2150 for AAA
    1500 for AA
    1100 for A, SA, RA and R
custom_expected: THEN show ovverideable warning for Club AND BOC: "The salary for level(s) of play [level(s) of play] must be $[required amount] for the first season"

title: Update error on Signed for next year: 5.24
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has a first year international/domestic contract
AND the contract is signed for next year
AND the date is on or after July 1st
AND there are already 12 or more players on the affiliates roster with a status of signed for next year
custom_expected: THEN show hard error for Club and override for BOC: "You have surpassed the twelve man limit for first year players signed for next season"
